definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
one's own flesh and blood (idiom); closely related
lit. interrelated as bones and flesh (idiom); inseparably related/closely intertwined

sentences.english: Education and knowledge has close inner relationship.
sentences.chinese: 教育与知识有着血肉相连的内在关系。

sentences.english: The coupling of the processors is carried out by the Video-RAM).
sentences.chinese: 两个处理器由视频内存相连。

sentences.english: The shed was formerly connected on its western side to the inner chambers. My mother sometimes would come over here.
sentences.chinese: 房子的西边和内室相连，先母曾经来过一次。

sentences.english: Hu said China and Mongolia are friendly neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛说，中蒙两国是山水相连的友好邻邦。

sentences.english: The treasure, we Are heart TO heart connected, probably The hoNey is sweet .
sentences.chinese: 宝，我们心心相连，好像蜜糖般甜。

sentences.english: Otherwise, that means none of these three points are connected and hence they are mutual strangers.
sentences.chinese: 否则，表示任一三个点都不相连，他们互相不认识。

sentences.english: Central station connects MDF of exchangers and provides all interfaces.
sentences.chinese: 中心站与交换机的主配线架相连，并提供所有接口。

sentences.english: So the two ends of the tetramer are indistinguishable.
sentences.chinese: 在最初，两个单体相连组成一个二聚体。

sentences.english: Video conferencing involves the linking of remote sites by one-way or two- way television.
sentences.chinese: 电视会议是将远程地点通过单向或双向电视相连接。

sentences.english: The length of a film should be directly related to the endurance of the human bladder.
sentences.chinese: 电影的长度应该和人的膀胱的忍受力相连。

sentences.english: Interestingly, Sylvanas is connected to the Lich King.
sentences.chinese: 有趣的是，西瓦娜斯和巫妖王是相连的。

sentences.english: The loops are connected by a cross-over section.
sentences.chinese: 这两个环路通过跨接部分彼此相连接。

sentences.english: Tree worship and serpent worship are also closely related.
sentences.chinese: 当然树崇拜与蛇崇拜也是紧密相连的。

sentences.english: The 1-dimensional array of logical blocks is mapped into the sectors of the disk sequentially.
sentences.chinese: 逻辑块的一维数组映射到磁盘上一些相连的扇区。

sentences.english: Transmissions - most teams run seven-speed units - bolt directly to the back of the engine.
sentences.chinese: 大多数车队的变速箱有七个档位，直接与引擎相连接。

sentences.english: Two outdoor courtyards can be accessed from the main foyer.
sentences.chinese: 主休息室与两个室外天井相连。

definition: to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
to merge with/interlinking/to join with/to interlock
horizontal traverse/to cut across/to cross transversally
to blend into one another/to blend together well
variant of 連接|连接[lian2 jie1]
to link up/to join together/to connect
